aboutMe: Experienced Backend Developer with expertise in full-stack development, cloud computing, DevOps, and product development. Currently pursuing an MS in computer science at California State University, Dominguez Hills (CSUDH). Passionate about research and development (R&D) and eager to contribute to cutting-edge projects.

projects.name: Microservices-based E-Commerce
description: Designed and implemented user authentication using OAuth2, ensuring secure role-based access control.
Deployed the platform on AWS EC2, utilizing Elastic Load Balancer (ELB) for distributing traffic, and Amazon RDS for relational database management.
Leveraged AWS S3 for static asset storage and AWS CloudWatch for performance monitoring and logging.
Integrated GCP services, including Google Pub/Sub for event-driven messaging and Google Cloud Storage for storing large datasets.
Orchestrated containerized microservices using Docker and Kubernetes, ensuring scalability and fault tolerance.
Automated deployment workflows using CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins and Bitbucket, ensuring continuous integration and streamlined updates.

projects.name: EVENT-DRIVEN INVENTORY MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
description: Deployed the system on AWS EC2, leveraging Docker for containerization and Kubernetes for orchestration to ensure scalability, fault tolerance, and high availability.
Integrated JWT for secure authentication and authorization, providing role-based access to the inventory management system.
Optimized database performance using Spring Data JPA, ensuring efficient handling of stock updates and reducing latency.
Developed and managed RESTful APIs for reliable communication between services, ensuring efficient data exchange and scalability.

experience.title: Technical Developer
description: Collaborated with clients to design, build, and test applications to ensure custom functionality met their business needs.
Led project work and sprints using Agile practices and JIRA, ensuring open communication and transparency across the project lifecycle.
Managed controlled versions and repositories using Git, enabling easy team collaboration and a structured approach to the code.
Ensured software quality using strict testing procedures, including unit, integration, and user acceptance testing (UAT).
Coordinated frequent software releases and bug fixing to surpass user expectations and meet business needs.

experience.title: Backend Developer | Vanna Infotech
description: Developed and released scalable microservices using Spring MVC, Spring Boot, Go, Java, Python, Docker, Kubernetes, and Apache Kafka to provide high availability, scalability, and easy interaction between distributed systems.

Implemented $Cl/CD$ processes using automation tools such as Jenkins, GitLab CI, Bitbucket, and Azure DevOps to dramatically shorten deployment time and testing using Infrastructure as Code (laC) via Terraform.
Improved application security using OAuth2, JWT, SAML, and role-based access control (RBAC), combined with the use of firewalls, VPNs, and IDS to secure APIs
Improved application performance using complex SQL queries, Spring Data JPA, and Redis to support coaching, hence speeding up processing of data and improving application scalability.
Experienced in using PostgreSQL, MySQL, and MongoDB to support varied requirements of data.
Improved software quality using test-driven development (TDD) and automation using JUnit, Mockito, Selenium, and Cucumber frameworks to enhance test efficacy and coverage.
Implemented interactive components based on design principles, cognitive task analysis (CTA), and Figma for UI/UX design.
Worked in collaboration with cross-functional groups of front-end developers, designers, and DevOps engineers to provide functionality using Agile (Scrum) methodologies.

CloudPlatforms: AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, CloudFormation, Elastic Beanstalk, CloudWatch)
